response.original_title: Compassion Internal Presents: Amy Grant & Michael W. Smith Christmas
response.overview: Multi-platinum, GRAMMY® winners AMY GRANT and MICHAEL W. SMITH are thrilled to reunite as they co-bill their popular Christmas tour this upcoming holiday season. After not being able to celebrate the holiday season last year on the road, they are excited to bring the merriment back!  We can’t all make the trip to see this highly anticipated concert, but we can all watch the show from the comfort of home with family and friends.  Join us for the exclusive digital premiere of Amy Grant and Michael W. Smith’s Christmas concert from Capitol One Hall in Tysons, VA.  This highly anticipated night features selections spanning the artists’ expansive Christmas repertoires and combine their vast collection of critically acclaimed holiday albums.
response.title: Compassion Internal Presents: Amy Grant & Michael W. Smith Christmas
